page.title: 12Beetham Primary School
page.content: Beetham School is very small.It has sixteen pupils.It is divided into two classrooms, one for Infants and one for juniors. School begins at 9 o'clock. They have assembly in the Infants class-room, which includes singing hymns and prayers. Then the morning lessons begin with each of them doing their individual maths. The morning play-time commences at 10.30 a.m. After play they do their topic work and sometimes do english and write essys. At noon they have their pack lunches.School starts at a quarter to one.They read for half an hour before they do Art & Craft. After play time, Miss.Lamb reads a story to them.
